resources.string:
Welcome to FTCScoring! 
 
Please come see 7161's pit to meet the development team and see a demo of the application! 
 
This program is designed to take match scouting to a different level. This easy to use app will allow you to enter team details after they play a match. The programs MMR algorithm takes care of the rest. 
 
For pits just enter 1-10 for each field (10 being the highest) and let the program do its magic! 
 
For matches navigate to the matches tab and enter in the required fields 
 
At the end of your scouting press "Get Best (Pit/Match) Team" and watch the app statistically get you the best alliance partner! 
 
Happy Scouting! 
Sorry! While the app is still under development, you may not be able to reach every text field so we recommend that you add as many as you can see then retract your keyboard so that you can see the other fields and enter the required values for them. 
 
*Algorithm gets best team based on MMR system. May not provide the best in game results*
